name: appearance
description:
The windowing area occupies all the screen under the top bar.
A message tray bar may appear at the bottom for notifications. By default, it shouldn't be visible.

steps.expected: the windowing area must be present with proper background
the message tray must be hidden

author: sdx

name: no-action
objective: Clicking on an empty zone in the window area shouldn't produce anything
description: Clicking anywhere in the window area with right/middle/left mouse buttons shouldn't produce anything (no popup, no action ...)

steps.description: click anywhere on background with left mouse button
double click anywhere on background with left mouse button
click anywhere on background with middle mouse button
double click anywhere on background with middle mouse button
click anywhere on background with right mouse button
double click anywhere on background with right mouse button
tap anywhere on background (if touchscreen supported)
double tap anywhere on background (if touchscreen supported)

author: sdx

name: window_titlebars_theme
objective: Windows in the windowing area must follow the visual design specifications
description:
Active windows have a blue close box with a diagonal cut (TODO: specs needed)
Title bars have a different image than the current theme (more cream-colored, with a vertical gradient, and with a hard bottom edge, as compared to the current theme) 
See the visual design specification for more details (TODO: references to be added)

steps.expected: a close button must be present on the right side
the window bar must have the "xterm" title
the bar design must conform to colors and themes specifications
